   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Megaco application
   24: %%          Testing the xxxOriginatingPendingLimit property of the 
   25: %%          root package
   26: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: -module(megaco_pending_limit_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: -export([
   30:  	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   34: 
   35: 	 sent_timer_late_reply/1,
   36: 	 sent_timer_exceeded/1,
   37: 	 sent_timer_exceeded_long/1,
   38: 	 sent_resend_late_reply/1,
   39: 	 sent_resend_exceeded/1,
   40: 	 sent_resend_exceeded_long/1,
   41: 	 recv_limit_exceeded1/1,
   42: 	 recv_limit_exceeded2/1,
   43: 	 otp_4956/1,
   44: 	 otp_5310/1,
   45: 	 otp_5619/1
   46: 	
   47: 	]).
   48: 
   49: 
   50: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   51: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco_message_v1.hrl").
   52: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   53: 
   54: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   55: -define(MGC_VERBOSITY,  debug).
   56: -define(MG_VERBOSITY,   debug).
   57: 
   58: -define(VERSION, 1).
   59: 
   60: -define(A4444, ["11111111", "00000000", "00000000"]).
   61: -define(A4445, ["11111111", "00000000", "11111111"]).
   62: -define(A5555, ["11111111", "11111111", "00000000"]).
   63: -define(A5556, ["11111111", "11111111", "11111111"]).
   64: 
   65: -define(MGC_START(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb), 
   66: 	megaco_test_mgc:start(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb)).
   67: -define(MGC_START(Pid, ET, Conf), 
   68:         ?MGC_START(Pid, {deviceName, "ctrl"}, ET, Conf, ?MGC_VERBOSITY)).
   69: -define(MGC_START(Pid, ET),
   70:         ?MGC_START(Pid, ET, [])).
   71: -define(MGC_STOP(Pid), megaco_test_mgc:stop(Pid)).
   72: -define(MGC_GET_STATS(Pid, No), megaco_test_mgc:get_stats(Pid, No)).
   73: -define(MGC_RESET_STATS(Pid),   megaco_test_mgc:reset_stats(Pid)).
   74: -define(MGC_REQ_IGNORE(Pid),    megaco_test_mgc:request_ignore(Pid)).
   75: -define(MGC_REQ_PIGNORE(Pid),   megaco_test_mgc:request_pending_ignore(Pid)).
   76: -define(MGC_REQ_DISC(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:request_discard(Pid,To)).
   77: -define(MGC_REQ_PEND(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:request_pending(Pid,To)).
   78: -define(MGC_REQ_HAND(Pid, To),  megaco_test_mgc:request_handle(Pid, To)).
   79: -define(MGC_REQ_HANDS(Pid),     megaco_test_mgc:request_handle_sloppy(Pid)).
   80: -define(MGC_UPDATE_UI(Pid,Tag,Val), 
   81: 	megaco_test_mgc:update_user_info(Pid,Tag,Val)).
   82: -define(MGC_UPDATE_CI(Pid,Tag,Val), 
   83: 	megaco_test_mgc:update_conn_info(Pid,Tag,Val)).
   84: -define(MGC_USER_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mgc:user_info(Pid,Tag)).
   85: -define(MGC_CONN_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mgc:conn_info(Pid,Tag)).
   86: -define(MGC_ACK_INFO(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:ack_info(Pid,To)).
   87: -define(MGC_ABORT_INFO(Pid,To), megaco_test_mgc:abort_info(Pid,To)).
   88: -define(MGC_DISCO(Pid,Reason),  megaco_test_mgc:disconnect(Pid,Reason)).
   89: 
   90: -define(MG_START(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb), 
   91: 	megaco_test_mg:start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb)).
   92: -define(MG_START(Pid, Enc, Transp, Conf), 
   93: 	?MG_START(Pid, {deviceName, "mg"}, Enc, Transp, Conf, ?MG_VERBOSITY)).
   94: -define(MG_START(Pid, Enc, Transp), 
   95: 	?MG_START(Pid, Enc, Transp, [])).
   96: -define(MG_STOP(Pid), megaco_test_mg:stop(Pid)).
   97: -define(MG_GET_STATS(Pid, No), megaco_test_mg:get_stats(Pid, No)).
   98: -define(MG_RESET_STATS(Pid), megaco_test_mg:reset_stats(Pid)).
   99: -define(MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid), megaco_test_mg:service_change(Pid)).
  100: -define(MG_NOTIF_RAR(Pid), megaco_test_mg:notify_request_and_reply(Pid)).
  101: -define(MG_NOTIF_REQ(Pid), megaco_test_mg:notify_request(Pid)).
  102: -define(MG_NOTIF_AR(Pid),  megaco_test_mg:await_notify_reply(Pid)).
  103: -define(MG_CANCEL(Pid,R),  megaco_test_mg:cancel_request(Pid,R)).
  104: -define(MG_APPLY_LOAD(Pid,CntStart), megaco_test_mg:apply_load(Pid,CntStart)).
  105: -define(MG_UPDATE_UI(Pid,Tag,Val), 
  106: 	megaco_test_mg:update_user_info(Pid,Tag,Val)).
  107: -define(MG_UPDATE_CI(Pid,Tag,Val), 
  108: 	megaco_test_mg:update_conn_info(Pid,Tag,Val)).
  109: -define(MG_USER_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:user_info(Pid,Tag)).
  110: -define(MG_CONN_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:conn_info(Pid,Tag)).
  111: -define(MG_GRP_REQ(Pid,N),     megaco_test_mg:group_requests(Pid,N)).
  112: -define(MG_ECC(Pid, M, T, F),  megaco_test_mg:enable_test_code(Pid,M,T,F)).
  113: 
  114: 
  115: %%======================================================================
  116: %% Common Test interface functions
  117: %%======================================================================
  118: 
  119: suite() -> 
  120:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
  121: 
  122: all() -> 
  123:     [
  124:      {group, sent},
  125:      {group, recv},
  126:      {group, tickets}
  127:     ].
  128: 
  129: groups() -> 
  130:     [
  131:      {sent,    [], sent_cases()},
  132:      {recv,    [], recv_cases()},
  133:      {tickets, [], tickets_cases()}
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: sent_cases() ->
  137:     [
  138:      sent_timer_late_reply,
  139:      sent_timer_exceeded,
  140:      sent_timer_exceeded_long,
  141:      sent_resend_late_reply,
  142:      sent_resend_exceeded,
  143:      sent_resend_exceeded_long
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: recv_cases() ->
  147:     [
  148:      recv_limit_exceeded1,
  149:      recv_limit_exceeded2
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: tickets_cases() ->
  153:     [
  154:      otp_4956,
  155:      otp_5310,
  156:      otp_5619
  157:     ].
  158: 
  159: 
  160: 
  161: %%
  162: %% -----
  163: %%
  164: 
  165: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  166:     [];
  167: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  168:     [];
  169: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  170: 
  171:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  172: 
  173:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  174:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  175:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  176: 
  177:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  178:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  179:             SKIP;
  180: 
  181:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  182: 
  183:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  184:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  185: 
  186:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  187:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  188:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  189: 
  190:             Config1
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  194: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  195: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  196: 
  197:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  198:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  199:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  200: 
  201:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  202:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  203: 
  204:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  205:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  206: 
  207:     Config1.
  208: 
  209: 
  210: %%
  211: %% -----
  212: %%
  213: 
  214: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  215:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  216:     Config.
  217: 
  218: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  219:     Config.
  220: 
  221: 
  222: 
  223: %%
  224: %% -----
  225: %%
  226: 
  227: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  228:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  229: 
  230:     ?ANNOUNCE_CASE_INIT(Case),
  231: 
  232:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  233:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  234:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  235: 
  236:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  237:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  238: 
  239: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  240:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  241: 
  242:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  243:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  244:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  245: 
  246:     p("system events during test: "
  247:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  248: 
  249:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  250: 
  251: 
  252: 
  253: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  254: %%%                                                                   %%%
  255: %%%                    Sent pending test cases                        %%%
  256: %%%                                                                   %%%
  257: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  258: 
  259: sent_timer_late_reply(suite) ->
  260:     [];
  261: sent_timer_late_reply(doc) ->
  262:     "...";
  263: sent_timer_late_reply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  264:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  265:     Pre  = fun() ->
  266:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  267:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_stlr_mgc),
  268:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_stlr_mg),
  269:                    i("try start nodes: "
  270:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  271:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  272:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  273:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  274:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  275:                    #{conf => Config, nodes => Nodes}
  276:            end,
  277:     Case = fun(State) ->
  278:                    do_sent_timer_late_reply(State)
  279:            end,
  280:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  281:                    i("stop nodes"),
  282:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  283:                    ok
  284:            end,
  285:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  286: 
  287: do_sent_timer_late_reply(#{conf := Config, nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  288:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  289:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  290:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  291:     MgcConf = [{megaco_trace, false}],
  292:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET, MgcConf),
  293: 
  294:     i("[MG] start"),    
  295:     MgConf   = [?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, io)], % [{megaco_trace, io}],
  296:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp, MgConf),
  297: 
  298:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  299: 
  300:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  301:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  302:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  303: 
  304:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  305: 
  306:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  307:     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  308: 				      factor   = 1},
  309:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  310: 
  311:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  312:     PendingLimit = 5,
  313:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  314: 
  315:     d("[MGC] late reply to requests "
  316:       "(simulate that the request takes a long time)"),
  317:     {ok, _} = ?MGC_REQ_DISC(Mgc, 11000),
  318: 
  319:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  320:     {ok, Reply} = ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg),
  321:     d("[MG] Reply: ~p", [Reply]),
  322:     case Reply of
  323: 	{_Version, {ok, [_ActionReply]}} ->
  324: 	    ok;
  325: 	_ ->
  326: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply, Reply})
  327:     end,
  328: 
  329:     %% Tell MG to stop
  330:     i("[MG] stop"),
  331:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  332: 
  333:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  334:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  335:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  336: 
  337:     i("done"),
  338:     ok.
  339: 
  340: 
  341: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  342: 
  343: sent_timer_exceeded(suite) ->
  344:     [];
  345: sent_timer_exceeded(doc) ->
  346:     "...";
  347: sent_timer_exceeded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  349:     Pre  = fun() ->
  350:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  351:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_ste_mgc),
  352:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_ste_mg),
  353:                    i("try start nodes: "
  354:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  355:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  356:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  357:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  358:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  359:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
  360:            end,
  361:     Case = fun(State) ->
  362:                    do_sent_timer_exceeded(State)
  363:            end,
  364:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  365:                    i("stop nodes"),
  366:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  367:                    ok
  368:            end,
  369:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  370: 
  371: do_sent_timer_exceeded(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  372:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  373:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  374:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  375:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
  376: 
  377:     i("[MG] start"),
  378:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
  379: 
  380:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  381: 
  382:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  383:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  384:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  385: 
  386:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  387: 
  388:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  389:     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  390: 				      factor   = 1},
  391:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  392: 
  393:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  394:     PendingLimit = 5,
  395:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  396: 
  397:     d("[MGC] no reply to requests "
  398:       "(simulate that the request takes a __long__ time)"),
  399:     ?MGC_REQ_IGNORE(Mgc),
  400: 
  401:     d("sleep 5 seconds to align trace output"),
  402:     sleep(5000),
  403: 
  404:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  405:     {ok, {_ProtocolVersion, {error, ED}}} = ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg),
  406:     d("[MG] ED: ~p", [ED]),
  407:     ErrorCode = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
  408:     ErrorCode = ED#'ErrorDescriptor'.errorCode, 
  409: 
  410:     %% Tell MG to stop
  411:     i("[MG] stop"),
  412:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  413: 
  414:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  415:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  416:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  417: 
  418:     i("done"),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: 
  422: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  423: 
  424: sent_timer_exceeded_long(suite) ->
  425:     [];
  426: sent_timer_exceeded_long(doc) ->
  427:     "...";
  428: sent_timer_exceeded_long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  429:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  430:     Pre  = fun() ->
  431:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  432:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_stel_mgc),
  433:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_stel_mg),
  434:                    i("try start nodes: "
  435:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  436:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  437:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  438:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  439:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  440:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
  441:            end,
  442:     Case = fun(State) ->
  443:                    do_sent_timer_exceeded_long(State)
  444:            end,
  445:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  446:                    i("stop nodes"),
  447:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  448:                    ok
  449:            end,
  450:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  451: 
  452: do_sent_timer_exceeded_long(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  453:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  454:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  455:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  456:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
  457: 
  458:     i("[MG] start"),    
  459:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
  460: 
  461:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  462: 
  463:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  464:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  465:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  466: 
  467:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  468: 
  469:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  470:     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  471: 				      factor   = 1},
  472:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  473: 
  474:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  475:     PendingLimit = 5,
  476:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  477: 
  478:     d("[MGC] long request with no reply ~n"
  479:       "   (simulate that we know that this will "
  480:       "take a while, but takes even longer...)"),
  481:     ?MGC_REQ_PIGNORE(Mgc),
  482: 
  483:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  484:     {ok, {_ProtocolVersion, {error, ED}}} = ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg),
  485:     d("[MG] ED: ~p", [ED]),
  486:     ErrorCode = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
  487:     ErrorCode = ED#'ErrorDescriptor'.errorCode, 
  488: 
  489:     %% Tell MG to stop
  490:     i("[MG] stop"),
  491:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  492: 
  493:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  494:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  495:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  496: 
  497:     i("done"),
  498:     ok.
  499: 
  500: 
  501: 
  502: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  503: 
  504: %% This test case can only be run with the stack compiled with
  505: %% the MEGACO_TEST_CODE flag. Therefor there is no point in 
  506: %% including this test case in the usual test suite
  507: sent_resend_late_reply(suite) ->
  508:     [];
  509: sent_resend_late_reply(doc) ->
  510:     "...";
  511: sent_resend_late_reply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  512:     Cond = fun megaco_test_code/0,
  513:     Pre  = fun() ->
  514:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  515:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_srlr_mgc),
  516:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_srlr_mg),
  517:                    i("try start nodes: "
  518:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  519:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  520:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  521:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  522:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  523:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
  524:            end,
  525:     Case = fun(State) ->
  526:                    do_sent_resend_late_reply(State)
  527:            end,
  528:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  529:                    i("stop nodes"),
  530:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  531:                    ok
  532:            end,
  533:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  534: 
  535: do_sent_resend_late_reply(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  536:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  537:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  538:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  539:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
  540: 
  541:     i("[MG] start"),    
  542:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
  543: 
  544:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  545: 
  546:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  547:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  548:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  549: 
  550:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  551: 
  552:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  553:     PendingTimer = infinity,
  554:     %%     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  555:     %% 				      factor    = 1},
  556:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  557: 
  558:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  559:     PendingLimit = 5,
  560:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  561: 
  562:     d("[MG] update connection info request timer"),
  563:     RequestTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  564: 				      factor   = 1},
  565:     ?MG_UPDATE_CI(Mg, request_timer, RequestTimer),
  566: 
  567:     d("[MGC] no reply to requests "
  568:       "(simulate that the request takes a __long__ time)"),
  569:     ?MGC_REQ_IGNORE(Mgc),
  570: 
  571:     d("[MG] set the 'init_request_timer' tag"),
  572:     EccRes = (catch ?MG_ECC(Mg, megaco_messenger, 
  573: 			    init_request_timer, fun init_request_timer/1)),
  574:     d("[MG] EccRes: ~p", [EccRes]),
  575: 
  576:     d("[MGC] late reply to requests "
  577:       "(simulate that the request takes a long time)"),
  578:     ?MGC_REQ_DISC(Mgc, 11000),
  579: 
  580:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  581:     {ok, Reply} = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
  582:     d("[MG] Reply: ~p", [Reply]),
  583:     {_Version, {ok, [_ActionReply]}} = Reply,
  584: 
  585:     %% Tell MG to stop
  586:     i("[MG] stop"),
  587:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  588: 
  589:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  590:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  591:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  592: 
  593:     %% Cleanup
  594:     d("stop nodes"),
  595:     ?STOP_NODES([MgcNode, MgNode]),
  596: 
  597:     i("done", []),
  598:     ok.
  599: 
  600: 
  601: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  602: 
  603: %% This test case can only be run with the stack compiled with
  604: %% the MEGACO_TEST_CODE flag. Therefor there is no point in 
  605: %% including this test case in the usual test suite
  606: sent_resend_exceeded(suite) ->
  607:     [];
  608: sent_resend_exceeded(doc) ->
  609:     "...";
  610: sent_resend_exceeded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  611:     Cond = fun megaco_test_code/0,
  612:     Pre  = fun() ->
  613:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  614:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_sre_mgc),
  615:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_sre_mg),
  616:                    i("try start nodes: "
  617:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  618:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  619:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  620:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  621:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  622:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
  623:            end,
  624:     Case = fun(State) ->
  625:                    do_sent_resend_exceeded(State)
  626:            end,
  627:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  628:                    i("stop nodes"),
  629:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  630:                    ok
  631:            end,
  632:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  633: 
  634: do_sent_resend_exceeded(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  635:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  636:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  637:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  638:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
  639: 
  640:     i("[MG] start"),    
  641:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
  642: 
  643:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  644: 
  645:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  646:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  647:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  648: 
  649:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  650: 
  651:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  652:     PendingTimer = infinity,
  653:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  654: 
  655:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  656:     PendingLimit = 5,
  657:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  658: 
  659:     d("[MG] update connection info request timer"),
  660:     RequestTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  661: 				      factor   = 1},
  662:     ?MG_UPDATE_CI(Mg, request_timer, RequestTimer),
  663: 
  664:     d("[MGC] no reply to requests "
  665:       "(simulate that the request takes a __long__ time)"),
  666:     ?MGC_REQ_IGNORE(Mgc),
  667: 
  668:     d("[MG] set the 'init_request_timer' tag"),
  669:     EccRes = (catch ?MG_ECC(Mg, megaco_messenger, 
  670: 			    init_request_timer, fun init_request_timer/1)),
  671:     d("[MG] EccRes: ~p", [EccRes]),
  672: 
  673:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  674:     ED = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
  675:     d("[MG] ED: ~p", [ED]),
  676:     ErrorCode = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
  677:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ErrorCode} = ED,
  678: 
  679:     %% Tell MG to stop
  680:     i("[MG] stop"),
  681:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  682: 
  683:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  684:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  685:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  686: 
  687:     i("done"),
  688:     ok.
  689: 
  690:

  713:            end,

  715:                    do_sent_resend_exceeded_long(State)
  716:            end,

  718:                    i("stop nodes"),
  719:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  720:                    ok
  721:            end,

  723: 
  724: do_sent_resend_exceeded_long(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  725:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  726:     i("[MGC] start"),

  728:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
  729: 
  730:     i("[MG] start"),    
  731:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
  732: 
  733:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  734: 
  735:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  736:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
  737:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
  738: 
  739:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
  740: 
  741:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
  742:     PendingTimer = infinity,
  743:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
  744: 
  745:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
  746:     PendingLimit = 5,
  747:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
  748: 
  749:     d("[MG] update connection info request timer"),
  750:     RequestTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(5),
  751: 				      factor   = 1},
  752:     ?MG_UPDATE_CI(Mg, request_timer, RequestTimer),
  753: 
  754:     d("[MGC] long request with no reply ~n"
  755:       "   (simulate that we know that this will "
  756:       "take a while, but takes even longer...)"),
  757:     ?MGC_REQ_PIGNORE(Mgc),
  758: 
  759:     d("[MG] set the 'init_request_timer' tag"),
  760:     EccRes = (catch ?MG_ECC(Mg, megaco_messenger, 
  761: 			    init_request_timer, fun init_request_timer/1)),
  762:     d("[MG] EccRes: ~p", [EccRes]),
  763: 
  764:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
  765:     ED = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
  766:     d("[MG] ED: ~p", [ED]),
  767:     ErrorCode = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
  768:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ErrorCode} = ED,
  769: 
  770:     %% Tell MG to stop
  771:     i("[MG] stop"),
  772:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
  773: 
  774:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  775:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  776:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  777: 
  778:     i("done"),
  779:     ok.

  788: recv_limit_exceeded1(suite) ->
  789:     [];
  790: recv_limit_exceeded1(doc) ->
  791:     "Received pending limit exceeded (exactly)";
  792: recv_limit_exceeded1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  793:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  794:     Pre  = fun() ->
  795:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  796:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_rle_mgc),
  797:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_rle_mg),
  798:                    i("try start nodes: "
  799:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  800:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
  801:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  802:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
  803:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  804:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
  805:            end,
  806:     Case = fun(State) ->
  807:                    do_recv_limit_exceeded1(State)
  808:            end,
  809:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
  810:                    i("stop nodes"),
  811:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
  812:                    ok
  813:            end,
  814:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  815: 
  816: do_recv_limit_exceeded1(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
  817:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
  818:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
  819: 
  820:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
  821:     MgcEvSeq = rle1_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
  822: 
  823:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
  824:     sleep(1000),
  825: 
  826:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
  827:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
  828: 
  829:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
  830:     sleep(1000),
  831: 
  832:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
  833:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
  834: 
  835:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
  836:     MgEvSeq = rle1_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
  837: 
  838:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
  839:     sleep(1000),
  840: 
  841:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
  842:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
  843: 
  844:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
  845:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
  846: 
  847:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  848:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
  849:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
  850: 
  851:     %% Tell Mg to stop
  852:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
  853:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
  854: 
  855:     i("done"),
  856:     ok.
  857: 
  858: 
  859: %%
  860: %% MGC generator stuff
  861: %% 
  862: -define(rle1_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
  863: 	rle1_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
  864: -define(rle1_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
  865: 	rle1_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
  866: -define(rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(Mid),
  867: 	rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(Mid)).
  868: -define(rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
  869: 	rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun()).
  870: 
  871: rle1_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
  872:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
  873:     EM  = megaco_pretty_text_encoder,
  874:     EC  = [],
  875:     rle1_mgc_event_sequence2(Mid, EM, EC).
  876: 
  877: rle1_mgc_event_sequence2(Mid, EM, EC) ->
  878:     DecodeFun = ?rle1_mgc_decode_msg_fun(EM, EC),
  879:     EncodeFun = ?rle1_mgc_encode_msg_fun(EM, EC),
  880:     ServiceChangeReply = 
  881: 	rle1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
  882:     Pending = rle1_mgc_pending_msg(Mid,2),
  883:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = 
  884: 	?rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(Mid),
  885:     NotifyReqVerify = ?rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
  886: %%     ServiceChangeReqVerify = 
  887: %% 	rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
  888: %%     NotifyReqVerify = rle1_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun(),
  889:     EvSeq = 
  890: 	[{debug,  true},
  891: 	 {decode, DecodeFun},
  892: 	 {encode, EncodeFun},
  893: 	 {listen, 2944},
  894: 	 {expect_accept, any},
  895: 	 {expect_receive, "service-change-req", 
  896: 	  {ServiceChangeReqVerify, 10000}}, 
  897: 	 {send, "service-change-reply", ServiceChangeReply}, 
  898: 	 {expect_receive, "notify-request", {NotifyReqVerify, 5000}},
  899: 	 {sleep, 100},
  900: 	 {send, "pending 1", Pending}, 
  901: 	 {sleep, 100},
  902: 	 {send, "pending 2", Pending}, 
  903: 	 {sleep, 100},
  904: 	 {send, "pending 3", Pending}, 
  905: 	 {sleep, 100},
  906: 	 {send, "pending 4", Pending}, 
  907: 	 {sleep, 100},
  908: 	 {send, "pending 5", Pending}, 
  909: 	 {sleep, 1000},
  910: 	 disconnect
  911: 	 ],
  912:     EvSeq.
  913: 
  914: rle1_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
  915:     fun(M) ->
  916:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
  917:     end.
  918: 
  919: rle1_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
  920:    fun(M) ->
  921:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
  922:     end.
  923: 
  924: rle1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
  925:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
  926:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms,SCRP},
  927:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
  928:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
  929:                                   serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
  930:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
  931:     rle1_mgc_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
  932:      
  933: rle1_mgc_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
  934:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
  935:                          commandReply = [CR]},
  936:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
  937:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
  938:                                transactionResult = ARs},
  939:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
  940:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
  941:                       mId         = Mid,
  942:                       messageBody = Body},
  943:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
  944:      
  945: rle1_mgc_pending_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
  946:     TP   = #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId},
  947:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionPending, TP}]},
  948:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
  949:                       mId         = Mid,
  950:                       messageBody = Body},
  951:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
  952: 
  953: rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(Mid) ->
  954:     fun(M) ->
  955: 	    rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(M, Mid)
  956:     end.
  957: 
  958: rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
  959: 				       _Mid1) ->
  960:     io:format("rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg -> entry with"
  961: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
  962: 	      "~n", [M]),
  963:     #'Message'{version     = _V,
  964: 	       mId         = _Mid2,
  965: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess,
  966:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
  967:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
  968:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _Tid,
  969: 			  actions = [AR]} = TR,
  970:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId = _Cid,
  971: 		     contextRequest = _CtxReq,
  972: 		     contextAttrAuditReq = _CtxAar,
  973: 		     commandRequests = [CR]} = AR,
  974:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd,
  975: 		      optional = _Opt,
  976: 		      wildcardReturn = _WR} = CR,
  977:     {serviceChangeReq, SCR} = Cmd,
  978:     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = _TermID,
  979: 			    serviceChangeParms = SCP} = SCR,
  980:     #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
  981: 			 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} = SCP,
  982:     {ok, M};
  983: rle1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(M, _Mid) ->
  984:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
  985: 
  986: rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun() ->
  987:     fun(M) ->
  988: 	    rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M)
  989:     end.
  990: 
  991: rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
  992:     io:format("rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg -> entry with"
  993: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
  994: 	      "~n", [M]),
  995:     #'Message'{messageBody = Body} = Mess,
  996:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
  997:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
  998:     #'TransactionRequest'{actions = [AR]} = TR,
  999:     io:format("rle1_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun -> AR: "
 1000: 	      "~n~p~n", [AR]),
 1001:     #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} = AR,
 1002:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 1003:     {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 1004:     #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = OED} = NR,
 1005:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 1006:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 1007:     {ok, M};
 1008: rle1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M) ->
 1009:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 1010:     
 1011: % rle1_err_desc(T) ->
 1012: %     EC = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error,
 1013: %     ET = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[T])),
 1014: %     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.
 1015: 
 1016: 
 1017: %%
 1018: %% MG generator stuff
 1019: %% 
 1020: -define(rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
 1021: 	fun rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect/1).
 1022: -define(rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
 1023: 	fun rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep/1).
 1024: -define(rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep_fun(),
 1025: 	fun rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep/1).
 1026: 
 1027: rle1_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 1028:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 1029:     RI = [
 1030:           {port,             2944},
 1031:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 1032:           {encoding_config,  []},
 1033:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 1034:          ],
 1035:     rle1_mg_event_sequence2(Mid, RI).
 1036: 
 1037: rle1_mg_event_sequence2(Mid, RI) ->
 1038:     ServiceChangeReq = [rle1_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 1039:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 1040:     NotifyReq = [rle1_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1)],
 1041:     ConnectVerify            = ?rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 1042:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(), 
 1043:     TransReplyVerify         = ?rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep_fun(), 
 1044: %%     ConnectVerify            = fun rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect/1,
 1045: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = fun rle1_mg_verify_service_change_reply/1,
 1046: %%     TransReplyVerify         = fun rle1_mg_verify_trans_reply/1,
 1047:     EvSeq = [
 1048:              {debug, true},
 1049:              megaco_start,
 1050:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 1051: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, recv_pending_limit, 4},
 1052:              start_transport,
 1053:              {megaco_trace, disable}, %%100},
 1054:              {megaco_system_info, users},
 1055:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
 1056:              connect,
 1057:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 1058:              megaco_connect,
 1059:              {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 1060:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 1061:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 1062:              {sleep, 1000},
 1063:              {megaco_cast, NotifyReq, []},
 1064:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, TransReplyVerify},
 1065:              {sleep, 1000},
 1066:              megaco_stop_user,
 1067:              megaco_stop,
 1068:              {sleep, 1000}
 1069:             ],
 1070:     EvSeq.
 1071: 
 1072: 
 1073: rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 1074:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 1075: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 1076:     {ok, CH, ok};
 1077: rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 1078:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 1079: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 1080:     {error, Else, ok}.
 1081: 
 1082: rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
 1083:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 1084:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
 1085: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 1086:     case AR of
 1087: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 1088: 	    case SCR of
 1089: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 1090: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 1091: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 1092: 		    case Tid of
 1093: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 1094: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 1095: 			    case Res of
 1096: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 1097: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 1098: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 1099: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 1100: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 1101: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 1102: 					   Tag, Val},
 1103: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 1104: 			    end;
 1105: 			_ ->
 1106: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 1107: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 1108: 		    end;
 1109: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 1110: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 1111: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 1112: 	    end;
 1113: 	_ ->
 1114: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 1115: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 1116:     end;
 1117: rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Else) ->
 1118:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> unknown"
 1119: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 1120:     {error, Else, ok}.
 1121: 
 1122: rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep(
 1123:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 1124:    {error, exceeded_recv_pending_limit} = E, _}) ->
 1125:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep -> expected error~n", []),
 1126:     {ok, E    , error};
 1127: rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep(Else) ->
 1128:     io:format("rle1_mg_verify_trans_rep -> unknown"
 1129: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 1130:     {error, Else, error}.
 1131: 
 1132: rle1_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 1133:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 1134:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 1135:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1136:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 1137:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 1138:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1139:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1140: 
 1141: rle1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 1142:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 1143:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 1144:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 1145:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 1146:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 1147:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1148:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1149:

 1153: recv_limit_exceeded2(suite) ->
 1154:     [];
 1155: recv_limit_exceeded2(doc) ->
 1156:     "Received pending limit exceeded";
 1157: recv_limit_exceeded2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1158:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
 1159:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
 1160:     put(tc,        rle2),
 1161:     i("starting"),
 1162: 
 1163:     _MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 1164:     _MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 1165: 
 1166:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1167: 
 1168: 
 1169: 
 1170: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1171: %%%                                                                   %%%
 1172: %%%                       Ticket test cases                           %%%
 1173: %%%                                                                   %%%
 1174: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1175: 
 1176: otp_4956(suite) ->
 1177:     [];
 1178: otp_4956(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1179:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 1180:     Pre  = fun() ->
 1181:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1182:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_4956_mgc),
 1183:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_4956_mg),
 1184:                    i("try start nodes: "
 1185:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 1186:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 1187:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 1188:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 1189:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 1190:                    #{conf => Config, nodes => Nodes}
 1191:            end,
 1192:     Case = fun(State) ->
 1193:                    do_otp_4956(State)
 1194:            end,
 1195:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
 1196:                    i("stop nodes"),
 1197:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
 1198:                    ok
 1199:            end,
 1200:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 1201: 
 1202: do_otp_4956(#{conf := Config, nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
 1203:     i("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 1204:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 1205: 
 1206:     i("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 1207:     MgcEvSeq = otp_4956_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1208:                                            text, tcp),
 1209: 
 1210:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 1211:     sleep(1000),
 1212: 
 1213:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 1214:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 1215: 
 1216:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 1217:     sleep(1000),
 1218: 
 1219:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 1220:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 1221: 
 1222:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 1223:     MgEvSeq = otp_4956_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 1224: 
 1225:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 1226:     sleep(1000),
 1227: 
 1228:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 1229:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 1230: 
 1231:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 1232:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 1233: 
 1234:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 1235:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 1236:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 1237: 
 1238:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 1239:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 1240:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 1241: 
 1242:     i("done", []),
 1243:     ok.
 1244:

 1265:     RI = [
 1266:           {port,             2944},
 1267:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 1268:           {encoding_config,  []},
 1269:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}

 1274:     NotifyReqVerify2       = ?otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req2_fun(),

 1276:     DiscoVerify            = ?otp_4956_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 1277: %%     ConnectVerify          = otp_4956_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(),

 1279: %%     NotifyReqVerify1       = otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun1(),

 1282: %%     DiscoVerify            = fun otp_4956_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect/1,
 1283:     EvSeq = [
 1284:              {debug, true},
 1285: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 1286: 	     ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 1287:              megaco_start,
 1288:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 1289: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 4},
 1290:              start_transport,
 1291:              listen,
 1292:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 1293: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 1294:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request_sc, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 1295:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request_1, NotifyReqVerify1},

 1297:              {megaco_callback, nocall, 1000},

 1299:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect, DiscoVerify},
 1300:              megaco_stop_user,
 1301:              megaco_stop
 1302:             ],

 1316: otp_4956_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 1317:     fun(Req) ->
 1318: 	    otp_4956_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Req, Mid)
 1319:     end.
 1320: 
 1321: otp_4956_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 1322:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 1323:     io:format("otp_4956_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 1324: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 1325: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 1326:     case AR of
 1327: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 1328: 	    case CR of
 1329: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
 1330: 		    case Cmd of
 1331: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
 1332: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 1333: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
 1334: 			    case Tid of
 1335: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 1336: 						id = ["root"]} ->
 1337: 				    case Parms of
 1338: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
 1339: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 1340: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 1341: 					    Reply = 
 1342: 						{discard_ack, 
 1343: 						 [otp_4956_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
 1344: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
 1345: 					_ ->
 1346: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 1347: 					    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(Parms),
 1348: 					    ErrReply = {discard_ack, 
 1349: 							ED},
 1350: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 1351: 				    end;
 1352: 				_ ->
 1353: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 1354: 				    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(Tid),
 1355: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1356: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 1357: 			    end;
 1358: 			_ ->
 1359: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 1360: 			    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(Cmd),
 1361: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1362: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 1363: 		    end;
 1364: 		_ ->
 1365: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 1366: 		    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(CR),
 1367: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1368: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 1369: 	    end;
 1370: 	_ ->
 1371: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 1372: 	    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(AR),
 1373: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1374: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 1375:     end;
 1376: otp_4956_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
 1377:     ED       = otp_4956_err_desc(Else),
 1378:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1379:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 1380:

 1386: otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req1({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 1387:     io:format("otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req1 -> entry with"
 1388: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 1389: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 1390:     case AR of
 1391: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = Cid, 
 1392: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 1393: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 1394: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 1395: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 1396: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 1397: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 1398: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 1399: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 1400: 	    Reply = {discard_ack, [otp_4956_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 1401: 	    {ok, 6500, AR, Reply};
 1402: 	_ ->
 1403:                     ED = otp_4956_err_desc(AR),
 1404: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1405: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 1406:     end;
 1407: otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req1(Else) ->
 1408:     io:format("otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req1 -> entry with"
 1409: 	      "~n   Else: ~p"
 1410: 	      "~n", [Else]),
 1411:     ED       = otp_4956_err_desc(Else),
 1412:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1413:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.

 1420: otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req2({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 1421:     case AR of
 1422: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = _Cid, 
 1423: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 1424: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 1425: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 1426: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [_Tid],
 1427: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 1428: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 1429: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 1430: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 1431: 	    Reply = ignore,
 1432: 	    {ok, 100, AR, Reply};
 1433: 	_ ->
 1434: 	    ED = otp_4956_err_desc(AR),
 1435: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1436: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 1437:     end;
 1438: otp_4956_mgc_verify_notify_req2(Else) ->
 1439:     ED       = otp_4956_err_desc(Else),
 1440:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1441:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.

 1481: otp_4956_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 1482:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 1483:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 1484:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1485:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 1486:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 1487:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 1488:     AR.

 1500:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 1501:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 1526: otp_4956_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 1527:     DecodeFun = ?otp_4956_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 1528:     EncodeFun = ?otp_4956_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 1529:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 1530:     ServiceChangeReq = otp_4956_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 1531:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 1532:     NotifyReq = otp_4956_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, 2, 1, TermId, 1),
 1533:     ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun = ?otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1534:     PendingVerify               = ?otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(),
 1535:     PendingLimitVerify          = ?otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg_fun(),
 1536: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun = 
 1537: %% 	otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1538: %%     PendingVerify = otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(),
 1539: %%     PendingLimitVerify = otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg_fun(),
 1540:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 1541: 	     {decode, DecodeFun},
 1542: 	     {encode, EncodeFun},
 1543: 	     {connect, 2944},
 1544: 	     {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq}, 
 1545: 	     {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun, 10000}}, 
 1546: 	     {send, "notify request (first send)", NotifyReq}, 
 1547: 	     {sleep, 100},
 1548: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 1)", NotifyReq}, 
 1549: 	     {expect_receive, "pending 1", {PendingVerify, 1000}},
 1550: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 1551: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 2)", NotifyReq}, 
 1552: 	     {expect_receive, "pending 2", {PendingVerify, 1000}},
 1553: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 1554: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 3)", NotifyReq}, 
 1555: 	     {expect_receive, "pending 3", {PendingVerify, 1000}},
 1556: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 1557: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 4)", NotifyReq}, 
 1558: 	     {expect_receive, "pending 4", {PendingVerify, 1000}},
 1559: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 1560: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 5)", NotifyReq}, 
 1561: 	     {expect_receive, "pending limit exceeded", 
 1562: 	      {PendingLimitVerify, 1000}},
 1563: 	     {sleep, 4000},
 1564: 	     {send, "notify request (resend 6)", NotifyReq}, 
 1565: 	     {expect_nothing, 4000},
 1566: 	     disconnect
 1567: 	    ],
 1568:     EvSeq.
 1569: 
 1570: otp_4956_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 1571:     fun(M) -> 
 1572:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 1573:     end.
 1574: 
 1575: otp_4956_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 1576:     fun(M) -> 
 1577:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 1578:     end.
 1579: 
 1580: otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun() ->
 1581:     fun(M) ->
 1582: 	    otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(M)
 1583:     end.
 1584: 
 1585: otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(
 1586:   #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 1587:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg -> "
 1588: 	      "ok so far~n",[]),
 1589:     #'Message'{version     = _V,
 1590: 	       mId         = _MgMid,
 1591: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 1592:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 1593:     {transactionReply, TR} = Trans,
 1594:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 1595: 			immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1596: 			transactionResult = Res} = TR,
 1597:     {actionReplies, [AR]} = Res,
 1598:     #'ActionReply'{contextId = _Cid,
 1599: 		   errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1600: 		   contextReply = _CtxReq,
 1601: 		   commandReply = [CR]} = AR,
 1602:     {serviceChangeReply, SCR} = CR,
 1603:     #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = _TermID,
 1604: 			  serviceChangeResult = SCRes} = SCR,
 1605:     {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP} = SCRes,
 1606:     #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} = SCRP,
 1607:     {ok, M};
 1608: otp_4956_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(M) ->
 1609:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 1610: 
 1611: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun() ->
 1612:     fun(M) ->
 1613: 	    otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg(M)
 1614:     end.
 1615: 
 1616: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 1617:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg -> entry with"
 1618: 	      "~n   Mess. ~p"
 1619: 	      "~n", [Mess]),
 1620:     #'Message'{messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 1621:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 1622:     {transactionPending, TP} = Trans,
 1623:     #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = _Id} = TP,
 1624:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg -> done~n", []),
 1625:     {ok, M};
 1626: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg(M) ->
 1627:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_msg -> entry with"
 1628: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 1629: 	      "~n", [M]),
 1630:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 1631: 
 1632: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg_fun() ->
 1633:     fun(M) ->
 1634: 	    otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg(M)
 1635:     end.
 1636: 
 1637: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 1638:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg -> entry with"
 1639: 	      "~n   Mess: ~p"
 1640: 	      "~n", [Mess]),
 1641:     #'Message'{messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 1642:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 1643:     {transactionReply, TR} = Trans,
 1644:     case element(4, TR) of
 1645: 	{transactionError, ED} ->
 1646: 	    EC = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
 1647: 	    #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC} = ED,
 1648: 	    {ok, M};
 1649: 	_ ->
 1650: 	    {error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}}
 1651:     end;
 1652: otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg(M) ->
 1653:     io:format("otp_4956_mg_verify_pending_limit_msg -> entry with"
 1654: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 1655: 	      "~n", [M]),
 1656:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 1657: 
 1658: otp_4956_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 1659:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 1660:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 1661:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1662:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 1663:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 1664:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1665:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1666: 
 1667: otp_4956_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 1668:     AR    = otp_4956_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 1669:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 1670:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 1671:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 1672:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 1673: 
 1674: otp_4956_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 1675:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 1676:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 1677:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 1678:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 1679:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 1680:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1681:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1682: 
 1683: otp_4956_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Rid, TermId, Cid) ->
 1684:     AR      = otp_4956_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 1685:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 1686:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 1687:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 1688:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 1689: 
 1690: 
 1691: otp_4956_err_desc(T) ->
 1692:     EC = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error,
 1693:     ET = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[T])),
 1694:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.
 1695: 
 1696: 
 1697: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1698: 
 1699: otp_5310(suite) ->
 1700:     [];
 1701: otp_5310(doc) ->
 1702:     "...";
 1703: otp_5310(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1704:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 1705:     Pre  = fun() ->
 1706:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1707:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_5310_mgc),
 1708:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_5310_mg),
 1709:                    i("try start nodes: "
 1710:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 1711:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 1712:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 1713:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 1714:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 1715:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
 1716:            end,
 1717:     Case = fun(State) ->
 1718:                    do_otp_5310(State)
 1719:            end,
 1720:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
 1721:                    i("stop nodes"),
 1722:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
 1723:                    ok
 1724:            end,
 1725:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 1726: 
 1727: do_otp_5310(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
 1728:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
 1729:     i("[MGC] start"),    
 1730:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
 1731:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
 1732: 
 1733:     i("[MG] start"),    
 1734:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
 1735: 
 1736:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
 1737: 
 1738:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
 1739:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
 1740:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
 1741: 
 1742:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
 1743: 
 1744:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
 1745:     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(1),
 1746: 				      factor   = 1},
 1747:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
 1748: 
 1749:     d("[MGC] update connection info originating pending limit"),
 1750:     PendingLimit = 3,
 1751:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, orig_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
 1752: 
 1753:     ConnReps1 = ?MGC_CONN_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1754:     d("[MGC] ConnReps1: ~p", [ConnReps1]),
 1755:     case filter_aborted1(ConnReps1, []) of
 1756: 	[{_, []}] ->
 1757: 	    ok;
 1758: 	ConnFlt1 ->
 1759: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply_state, conn_info, ConnReps1, ConnFlt1})
 1760:     end,
 1761:     UserReps1 = ?MGC_USER_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1762:     d("[MGC] UserReps1: ~p", [UserReps1]),
 1763:     case filter_aborted1(UserReps1, []) of
 1764: 	[{_, []}] ->
 1765: 	    ok;
 1766: 	UserFlt1 ->
 1767: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply_state, user_info, UserReps1, UserFlt1})
 1768:     end,
 1769: 
 1770:     %% Instruct the MGC to never reply to requests
 1771:     d("[MGC] don't reply to requests"),
 1772:     ?MGC_REQ_IGNORE(Mgc),
 1773: 
 1774:     %% We want to know when the abort comes...
 1775:     d("[MGC] request abort inform"),
 1776:     ?MGC_ABORT_INFO(Mgc, self()),
 1777: 
 1778:     %% Make MG send a request
 1779:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
 1780:     {ok, {_ProtocolVersion, {error, ED}}} = ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg),
 1781:     d("[MG] ED: ~p", [ED]),
 1782:     ErrorCode = ?megaco_number_of_transactionpending_exceeded,
 1783:     ErrorCode = ED#'ErrorDescriptor'.errorCode, 
 1784: 
 1785:     %% Wait for the MGC to get aborted
 1786:     d("[MGC] await the abort callback"),
 1787:     {ok, TransId} = await_aborted(Mgc),
 1788:     d("[MGC] aborted transaction: ~p", [TransId]),
 1789: 
 1790:     %% Make sure we have one in aborted state
 1791:     d("[MGC] how many is aborted (should be == 1)?"),
 1792:     ConnReps2 = ?MGC_CONN_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1793:     case filter_aborted1(ConnReps2, []) of
 1794: 	[{_, [TransId]}] ->
 1795: 	    ok; 
 1796: 	[{_, []}] ->
 1797: 	    ok; % has already been cleaned up...
 1798: 	ConnFlt2 ->
 1799: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply_state, conn_info, ConnReps2, ConnFlt2})
 1800:     end,
 1801:     d("[MGC] ConnReps2: ~p", [ConnReps2]),
 1802:     UserReps2 = ?MGC_USER_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1803:     d("[MGC] UserReps2: ~p", [UserReps2]),
 1804:     case filter_aborted1(UserReps2, []) of
 1805: 	[{_, [TransId]}] ->
 1806: 	    ok;
 1807: 	[{_, []}] ->
 1808: 	    ok; % has already been cleaned up...
 1809: 	UserFlt2 ->
 1810: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply_state, user_info, UserReps2, UserFlt2})
 1811:     end,
 1812: 
 1813:     %% do disconnect and the do cancel in the handle function
 1814:     d("[MGC] disconnect"),
 1815:     DiscoRes = ?MGC_DISCO(Mgc, cancel),
 1816:     d("[MGC] DiscoRes: ~p", [DiscoRes]),
 1817: 
 1818:     %% check number of reply records (should be no in aborted).
 1819:     d("[MGC] check number of replies in aborted state (should be == 1)"),
 1820:     ConnReps3 = ?MGC_CONN_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1821:     d("[MGC] ConnReps3: ~p", [ConnReps3]),
 1822:     UserReps3 = ?MGC_USER_INFO(Mgc, replies),
 1823:     d("[MGC] UserReps3: ~p", [UserReps3]),
 1824: 
 1825:     i("done", []),
 1826:     ok.
 1827: 
 1828: await_aborted(Mgc) ->
 1829:     d("await_aborted"),
 1830:     receive
 1831: 	{abort_received, Mgc, TransId} ->
 1832: 	    {ok, TransId}
 1833:     after 10000 ->
 1834: 	    d("await_aborted - timeout"),
 1835: 	    {error, timeout}
 1836:     end.
 1837: 
 1838: filter_aborted1([], Acc) ->
 1839:     lists:reverse(Acc);
 1840: filter_aborted1([{CH, Ab}|T], Acc) ->
 1841:     filter_aborted1(T, [{CH, filter_aborted2(Ab, [])}|Acc]).
 1842: 
 1843: filter_aborted2([], Aborted) ->
 1844:     lists:reverse(Aborted);
 1845: filter_aborted2([{TransId, aborted, _}|T], Aborted) ->
 1846:     filter_aborted2(T, [TransId|Aborted]);
 1847: filter_aborted2([{TransId, State, _}|T], Aborted) ->
 1848:     d("Transaction ~w actually in state ~w", [TransId, State]),
 1849:     filter_aborted2(T, Aborted);
 1850: filter_aborted2([_|T], Aborted) ->
 1851:     filter_aborted2(T, Aborted).
 1852: 
 1853: 
 1854: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1855: 
 1856: %% The timeout times is a little odd in this test case. The (short)
 1857: %% request timer is longer then the (long) request timer. This is
 1858: %% simply to produce the effect that we want regarding max_retries =
 1859: %% infinity_restartable. Also the pending timeout has to be shorter
 1860: %% then "short" + "long" and longer then "long"
 1861: 
 1862: otp_5619(suite) ->
 1863:     [];
 1864: otp_5619(doc) ->
 1865:     "...";
 1866: otp_5619(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1867:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 1868:     Pre  = fun() ->
 1869:                    put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1870:                    MgcNode = make_node_name(pl_5619_mgc),
 1871:                    MgNode  = make_node_name(pl_5619_mg),
 1872:                    i("try start nodes: "
 1873:                      "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 1874:                      "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 1875:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 1876:                    Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 1877:                    ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 1878:                    #{nodes => Nodes}
 1879:            end,
 1880:     Case = fun(State) ->
 1881:                    do_otp_5619(State)
 1882:            end,
 1883:     Post = fun(#{nodes := Nodes}) ->
 1884:                    i("stop nodes"),
 1885:                    ?STOP_NODES(Nodes),
 1886:                    ok
 1887:            end,
 1888:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 1889: 
 1890: do_otp_5619(#{nodes := [MgcNode, MgNode]}) ->
 1891:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
 1892:     i("[MGC] start"),    
 1893:     ET = [{text, tcp}, {text, udp}, {binary, tcp}, {binary, udp}],
 1894:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, ET),
 1895: 
 1896:     i("[MG] start"),    
 1897:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, text, tcp),
 1898: 
 1899:     d("MG user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]),
 1900:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
 1901: 
 1902:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
 1903:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
 1904:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
 1905: 
 1906:     d("[MG] update connection info long request timer"),
 1907:     LongReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = timer:seconds(1),
 1908: 				    factor      = 1,
 1909: 				    max_retries = infinity_restartable},
 1910:     ?MG_UPDATE_CI(Mg, long_request_timer, LongReqTmr),
 1911: 
 1912:     d("MG conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]),
 1913: 
 1914:     d("MGC conn info: ~p", [?MGC_CONN_INFO(Mgc, all)]),
 1915: 
 1916:     d("[MGC] update connection info pending timer"),
 1917:     PendingTimer = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = timer:seconds(3),
 1918: 				      factor   = 1},
 1919:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, pending_timer, PendingTimer),
 1920: 
 1921:     d("[MGC] update connection info sent pending limit"),
 1922:     PendingLimit = 5,
 1923:     ?MGC_UPDATE_CI(Mgc, sent_pending_limit, PendingLimit),
 1924: 
 1925:     d("MGC conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mgc, all)]),
 1926: 
 1927: 
 1928:     d("[MGC] late reply to requests "
 1929:       "(simulate that the request takes a long time)"),
 1930:     {ok, _} = ?MGC_REQ_DISC(Mgc, 11000),
 1931: 
 1932: 
 1933:     d("[MG] send the notify and await the timeout"),
 1934:     {ok, Reply} = ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg),
 1935:     case Reply of
 1936: 	{_Version, {error, timeout}} ->
 1937: 	    d("[MG] expected reply (timeout) received~n", []);
 1938: 	_ ->
 1939: 	    ?ERROR({unexpected_reply, Reply})
 1940:     end,
 1941: 
 1942: 
 1943:     %% Tell MG to stop
 1944:     i("[MG] stop~n"),
 1945:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
 1946: 
 1947:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 1948:     i("[MGC] stop~n"),
 1949:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
 1950: 
 1951:     i("done"),
 1952:     ok.
 1953: 
 1954: 
 1955: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1956: 
 1957: 
 1958: %%
 1959: %% Common message creation functions
 1960: %%
 1961: 
 1962: cre_serviceChangeParm(M,R,P) ->
 1963:     #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod  = M, 
 1964:                          serviceChangeReason  = R, 
 1965:                          serviceChangeProfile = P}.
 1966: 
 1967: cre_serviceChangeReq(Tid, Parms) ->
 1968:     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = Tid, 
 1969:                             serviceChangeParms = Parms}.
 1970: 
 1971: cre_timeNotation(D,T) ->
 1972:     #'TimeNotation'{date = D, time = T}.
 1973: 
 1974: cre_obsEvent(Name, Not) ->
 1975:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 1976:                      timeNotation = Not}.
 1977: %% cre_obsEvent(Name, Not, Par) ->
 1978: %%     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 1979: %%                      timeNotation = Not, 
 1980: %%                      eventParList = Par}.
 1981: 
 1982: cre_obsEvsDesc(Id, EvList) ->
 1983:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{requestId        = Id, 
 1984:                                 observedEventLst = EvList}.
 1985: 
 1986: cre_notifyReq(Tid, EvsDesc) ->
 1987:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = Tid, 
 1988:                      observedEventsDescriptor = EvsDesc}.
 1989: 
 1990: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'NotifyRequest') ->
 1991:     {notifyReq, R};
 1992: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'ServiceChangeRequest') ->
 1993:     {serviceChangeReq, R}.
 1994: 
 1995: cre_cmdReq(Cmd) ->
 1996:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}.
 1997: 
 1998: cre_actionReq(CtxId, CmdReqs) when is_list(CmdReqs) ->
 1999:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxId,
 2000:                      commandRequests = CmdReqs}.
 2001: 
 2002: cre_transReq(TransId, ARs) when is_list(ARs) ->
 2003:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 2004: 			  actions       = ARs}.
 2005: 
 2006: %% --
 2007: 
 2008: cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid) ->
 2009:     cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid, ?VERSION).
 2010: 
 2011: cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid, V) ->
 2012:     #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId   = Mid, 
 2013: 			    serviceChangeVersion = V}.
 2014: 
 2015: cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP) when is_record(SCRP, 'ServiceChangeResParm') ->
 2016:     {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP};
 2017: cre_serviceChangeResult(ED) when is_record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') ->
 2018:     {errorDescriptor, ED}.
 2019: 
 2020: cre_serviceChangeReply(Tid, Res) ->
 2021:     #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = Tid, 
 2022:                           serviceChangeResult = Res}.
 2023: 
 2024: cre_cmdReply(R) when is_record(R, 'NotifyReply') ->
 2025:     {notifyReply, R};
 2026: cre_cmdReply(R) when is_record(R, 'ServiceChangeReply') ->
 2027:     {serviceChangeReply, R}.
 2028: 
 2029: cre_notifyReply(Tid) ->
 2030:     #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = Tid}.
 2031: 
 2032: cre_actionReply(CtxId, CmdRep) ->
 2033:     #'ActionReply'{contextId    = CtxId,
 2034:                    commandReply = CmdRep}.
 2035: 
 2036: %% cre_transResult(ED) when record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') ->
 2037: %%     {transactionError, ED};
 2038: %% cre_transResult([AR|_] = ARs) when record(AR, 'ActionReply') ->
 2039: %%     {actionReplies, ARs}.
 2040: 
 2041: %% cre_transReply(TransId, Res) ->
 2042: %%     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 2043: %%                         transactionResult = Res}.
 2044: 
 2045: %% --
 2046: 
 2047: cre_serviceChangeProf(Name, Ver) when is_list(Name) andalso is_integer(Ver) ->
 2048:     #'ServiceChangeProfile'{profileName = Name, 
 2049:                             version     = Ver}.
 2050: 
 2051: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionRequest') ->
 2052:     {transactionRequest, Trans};
 2053: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionPending') ->
 2054:     {transactionPending, Trans};
 2055: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionReply') ->
 2056:     {transactionReply, Trans};
 2057: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionAck') ->
 2058:     {transactionResponseAck, Trans}.
 2059: 
 2060: cre_transactions(Trans) when is_list(Trans) ->
 2061:     {transactions, Trans}.
 2062: 
 2063: cre_message(Version, Mid, Body) ->
 2064:     #'Message'{version     = Version,
 2065:                mId         = Mid,
 2066:                messageBody = Body}.
 2067: 
 2068: cre_megacoMessage(Mess) ->
 2069:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 2070: 
 2071: 
 2072: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2073: 
 2074: %% Transform a short timer to a long one.
 2075: %% The purpose of this is to trick the stack
 2076: %% to keep re-sending the request, even after 
 2077: %% having received the first pending (which
 2078: %% indicates that the other side _IS_ 
 2079: %% working on the request).
 2080: 
 2081: init_request_timer({short, Ref}) ->
 2082:     {long, Ref};  
 2083: init_request_timer(O) ->
 2084:     O.
 2085: 
 2086: 
 2087: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2088: 
 2089: encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf) ->
 2090:     Mod:encode_message(Conf, M).
 2091: 
 2092: %% encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf, Ver) ->
 2093: %%     Mod:encode_message(Conf, Ver, M).
 2094: 
 2095: decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf) ->
 2096:     Mod:decode_message(Conf, M).
 2097: 
 2098: %% decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf, Ver) ->
 2099: %%     Mod:decode_message(Conf, Ver, M).
 2100: 
 2101: 
 2102: 
 2103: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2104: 
 2105: make_node_name(Name) ->
 2106:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 2107: 	[_,Host] ->
 2108: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 2109: 	_ ->
 2110: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 2111:      end.
 2112: 
 2113: 
 2114: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2115: 
 2116: await_completion(Ids) ->
 2117:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids) of
 2118: 	{ok, Reply} ->
 2119: 	    d("OK => Reply: ~n~p", [Reply]),
 2120: 	    ok;
 2121: 	{error, Reply} ->
 2122: 	    d("ERROR => Reply: ~n~p", [Reply]),
 2123: 	    ?ERROR({failed, Reply})
 2124:     end.
 2125: 
 2126: 
 2127: 
 2128: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2129: 
 2130: try_tc(TCName, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 2131:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 2132: 
 2133: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 2134:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 2135: 
 2136: 
 2137: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2138: 
 2139: sleep(X) -> receive after X -> ok end.
 2140: 
 2141: 
 2142: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2143: 
 2144: -ifdef(MEGACO_TEST_CODE).
 2145: megaco_test_code() ->
 2146:     ok.
 2147: -else.
 2148: megaco_test_code() ->
 2149:     exit({skip, "Included only if compiled with USE_MEGACO_TEST_CODE=true"}).
 2150: -endif.
 2151: 
 2152: 
 2153: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2154: 
 2155: p(F, A) ->
 2156:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
 2157: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 2158: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 2159: 
 2160: 
 2161: i(F) ->
 2162:     i(F, []).
 2163: 
 2164: i(F, A) ->
 2165:     print(info, get(verbosity), get(tc), "INF", F, A).
 2166: 
 2167: 
 2168: d(F) ->
 2169:     d(F, []).
 2170: 
 2171: d(F, A) ->
 2172:     print(debug, get(verbosity), get(tc), "DBG", F, A).
 2173: 
 2174: 
 2175: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
 2176: printable(info, info) -> true;
 2177: printable(_,_)        -> false.
 2178: 
 2179: print(Severity, Verbosity, Tc, P, F, A) ->
 2180:     print(printable(Severity,Verbosity), Tc, P, F, A).
 2181: 
 2182: print(true, Tc, P, F, A) ->
 2183:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s:~w ***"
 2184: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 2185: 	      [?FTS(), P, self(), get(sname), Tc | A]);
 2186: print(_, _, _, _, _) ->
 2187:     ok.
 2188: 
 2189: 
 2190: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2191:
